Iron Head

January 7, 2022

Mark Your Calenders.

Lodging:

Avid Bentonville will be providing a discount for those traveling in for the weekend. Click here to take advantage of this sweet deal!

Location:

The Bentonville AllCross event will be held at Ironhead in Betonville. It is located on private property. Use this pin to locate the gate off of W Ford Springs Rd or follow the directions below. Once through the gate, follow the road back to registration.

Directions: Heading north on 49 exit 93 towards Bella Vista travel north on 71 take the first right on McNelly Road travel 1/4 of a mile and turn right onto Ford Springs Road Drive down Ford Springs Road approximately 7 tenths of a mile turn right across from the cemetery onto the property enter through the gate.

Schedule:

Post Party:

Please join us to continue the party after the event to build community and relationships - cause that is what cycling is about. The Bentonville after party will be hosted by The Meteor on D Street in Bentonville following the conclusion of the event.
